title: Just a question
body:
Okay,I understand players that maybe only joined 2-3 years ago maybe they have some more champions to buy but the old players complaining about the runes refund, what the actual fuck do you need it for?

At this point you are just complaining to make Riot look all bad and evil, not because you didn't get your ip or because you are not "respected" as an old player. You legit sound like some old ass grandpas complaining about the next generation.
